text: Brazilian Mastiff is a large mastiff-type dog that descends by crossing the Roman Mastiffs with the Bloodhound to develop this dog breed. This dog was also known in Brazil as Fila Brasileiro. Brazilian Mastiff is not a hound-type dog is a mastiff dog breed looks like a bloodhound than a mastiff. Although there are doubts as to whether the bloodhound actually has any composition in the genetics of this breed. Category:Dog breeds Category:FCI breeds
title: Fila Brasileiro
